Student of Shuson, part of Kanrai
1983年より現代俳句協会会長、1987年より朝日俳壇選者
1948年「天狼」に入会し山口誓子に師事 俳人協会会長

grandfather= Takahama Kyoshi. edits “Hototogisu” and selects for the Asahi Newspaper. president of the Japan Traditional Haiku Association, the director of the Kyoshi Memorial Museum and an adviser to Haiku International Association.
